thread.title: Schools Podcast: Chatting about Common Core, penalizing parents and diapers
thread.title_full: Schools Podcast: Chatting about Common Core, penalizing parents and diapers

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Schools Podcast: Chatting about Common Core, penalizing parents and diapers
text: Democrat and Chronicle education reporter Justin Murphy and columnist Erica Bryant are in schools around Rochester every week speaking with students, parents, teachers and administrators. They discuss the latest news in local K-12 education every other week on the Democrat and Chronicle Schools Podcast. Episode 1: Justin and Erica discuss New York State Education Commissioner MaryEllen Elia's recent visit to Rochester and the Common Core standards survey; a controversial proposal in Buffalo to penalize parents whose children don't come to school; an expansion of wraparound support services at School 17 in Rochester's JOSANA neighborhood; and the recently completed Democrat and Chronicle Diaper Drive for ROC City Bottoms.
